description:
Is Astro, the star of Astro's Playroom and Astro Bot, a Sony mascot? Nicolas Doucet isn't so sure. On a recent trip to Team Asobi's studio in Japan, we got an up-close look at how Astro came to be and the design philosophy that drives the studio's playful, polished little automaton.

Full Article:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/the-new-face-of-playstation-and-the-technomagic-behind-astro-bot/1100-6526261/
title: How Team Asobi Accidentally Made The New Face of PlayStation

description: Which class are you playing with in Space Marine 2's PvE operations?
title: Every Space Marine 2 Class EXPLAINED

description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 features a lot of ways to customize your loyalist Astartes or Heretic Chaos Space Marines. In the 41st Millennium there is only fashion, so here is every piece of armor available in Space Marine 2.
title: Every Armor Cosmetic In Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2

description: Astro Bot features special levels that pay homage to the iconic PlayStation franchise. The first one, Apes On The Loose, is a nod to the classic PS1 series, Ape Escape.
title: Astro Bot vs Ape Escape (PS1)

description: During the last Kombat Kast we got a look at Sektor in action. Here is a high level match between QA devs at NetherRealm Studios. We even get to see a new Brutality!
title: Mortal Kombat 1 - Sektor High Level Gameplay

description: Astro Bot features special levels that pay homage to iconic PlayStation franchise. The first one, Apes On The Loose, is a nod to the classic PS1 series, Ape Escape.
title: Astro Bot Ape Escape Level Gameplay

description:
Jeff Grubb and friends break down today's top stories in video games!

#gmm #gamemessmornings #giantbomb #videogamenews
title: Game Mess Mornings 09/06/24

description:
If you can't beat 'em, eat 'em. 🍪 Relive the Majin Buu Saga in DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO.

From the Justice Warrior appearance Great Saiyaman to the final Genkidama, let's see the characters that join the giant DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO  roster!

The characters joining the roster are:

1. Kid Buu
2. Majin Buu (Evil)
3. Super Buu
4. Super Buu (Gotenks Absorbed)
5. Super Buu (Gohan Absorbed)
6. Babidi
7. Ultimate Gohan
8. Gohan (Adult), Super Saiyan
9. Great Saiyaman

Are you ready to lend your energy for the final Genkidama ?
 
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO the first entry in the DRAGON BALL Z: BUDOKAI TENKAICHI series in 15 years will be released on 11th October 2024, on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.
title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO - Majin Buu Saga Character Trailer [BUDOKAI TENKAICHI Series]
